comments: Tests covering the use of the struct creation/access in UDFs (exclusively test methods)

tests.name: Create a struct from a string
statements: CREATE STREAM test (value STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT TOSTRUCT(value) AS value FROM test;

tests.name: Extract value from struct
statements: CREATE STREAM test (value STRUCT<A VARCHAR>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT TEST_UDF(value) AS VALUE FROM test;
